mapper.select: select count(id) from sys_user where username = #{username}
select id, username from sys_user where id = #{id}
select id, username, password, account_non_expired, account_non_locked, credentials_non_expired, enabled from sys_user where username = #{username}

select u.id, u.username, u.account_non_expired, u.account_non_locked, u.credentials_non_expired, u.enabled, u.created_by, u.created_date, u.last_modified_by, u.last_modified_date from sys_user u left join sys_user_info ui on u.id = ui.pid
where u.username like concat ('%', #{keyword}, '%') or ui.name like concat ('%', #{keyword}, '%') or ui.nickName like concat ('%', #{keyword}, '%') or ui.introduction like concat ('%', #{keyword}, '%')

select u.id, u.username, u.account_non_expired, u.account_non_locked, u.credentials_non_expired, u.enabled, u.created_by, u.created_date, u.last_modified_by, u.last_modified_date from sys_user u left join sys_user_role sur on sur.user_id = u.id left join sys_role r on r.id = sur.role_id left join sys_user_info i on i.pid = u.id where r.id = #{roleId}
and (u.username like concat ('%', #{keyword}, '%') or i.name like concat ('%', #{keyword}, '%') or i.nickName like concat ('%', #{keyword}, '%') or i.introduction like concat ('%', #{keyword}, '%'))

select u.id, u.username, u.account_non_expired, u.account_non_locked, u.credentials_non_expired, u.enabled, u.created_by, u.created_date, u.last_modified_by, u.last_modified_date from sys_user u left join sys_department_user sdr on sdr.user_id = u.id left join sys_department d on d.id = sdr.department_id left join sys_user_info i on i.pid = u.id where d.id = #{departmentId}
and (u.username like concat ('%', #{keyword}, '%') or i.name like concat ('%', #{keyword}, '%') or i.nickName like concat ('%', #{keyword}, '%') or i.introduction like concat ('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
